channel.title: HD not working
channel.description:
I downloaded a source plus client i compiled an ran the client with JDK7 tested HD and it worked but the server needed JDK6 for compiling and running, so i downloaded JDK6 and now the HD on the client doesnt work, it just says Unable to enter that mode.
Can anyone help me to get HD working again? Will +Rep to the people that help me get it working.

item.title: HD not working
